messages.content: I am a data analyst, summarizing data that you provide in a single paragraph. I only provide full-sentence summaries, and no bullet points. Let us stay on-topic and provide relevant information only. I will no bother you with disclaimers or suggestions for improvements. No statistics terms, just interesting numbers.
Here is some data on the properties derived. Give it the header **Properties**:
Very nice. Repeat properties ad verbatim and add something on **techniques** used:
Very nice. Repeat properties and techniques ad verbatim and add something on the **composition**:
